body.name: NEEWER Camera Tripod with Remote, Mini Flexible Tripod Stand with Action Camera Mount Adapter for Hero 12 11 10 9, Hidden Phone Holder with Cold Shoe 1/4" Screw, Phone Vlog Tripod Max Load 4.4lb, T30
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 9 hrs 40 mins
features: 【Strong Bendable Flexible Tripod for Camera Vlogging】 With bendable legs, NEEWER T30 small octopus vlogging tripod stand with a Bluetooth remote shutter wraps around lampposts, fence posts, tree limbs, bike handlebars and stabilizes your DSLR camera, action camera, smartphone, or tablet up to 4.4lb (2kg). Also functions as a tabletop tripod desk stand or a handgrip selfie stick for vlogging, live streaming, video recording, and filmmaking

【Action Camera Mount Adapter & 1/4" Extension Thread】 Bonus with a tripod mount adapter for action cameras, compatible with GoPro Hero 12 11 10 9 8 Black Insta360 ONE X3 X2 GO 3 GO 2 DJI Osmo Action 4 3 2, etc. A 1/4" threaded mounting point at the side enables you to connect a mini LED video light, vlog microphone, monitor, magic arm for improved shooting quality

【2in1 Hidden Phone Holder with Camera Mount 1/4" Screw】 Fold the smartphone clamp for mounting DSLRs via the 1/4" screw, compatible with Sony ZV-1 II ZV-E1 ZV-E10 a6400 a6000 Canon EOS R50 Mark II M50 Fujifilm X-S20 Nikon Z30 Panasonic Lumix S5 IIX, etc. When unfolded, it is compatible with iPhone 15 Pro Max 14 13 SE series Samsung S23 Ultra Google Pixel 8 7, and other phones within 4"-3.5"(62-90mm) width. A cold shoe for attaching extra lighting or recording accessories

【Multi Angle Shots Detachable Ball Head】 Pivot the ball head at 360° to get the position that meets all round shooting. Or tilt it at 90° via dual U notches to shoot in vertical or horizontal directions. It is also detachable and can connect to other small tripods, mini phone tripods, vlogging camera tripod stands via the bottom 1/4" threaded hole

【Lightweight & Portable】 12.6" (32cm) in length and 11.3oz (320g) in weight. Three flexible legs are crafted from thickened aluminum cores with durable non slip rubber exteriors. Protective rubber pads on the camera mounting plate and phone holder prevent scratches. Enjoy wireless picture and video capture from up to 33ft (10m) away with the Bluetooth shutter release - no need to reach your arm to the phone screen

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Way better than expected
reviews.reviewText: I had bought a cheap little flexible tripod years ago, and thought this would be similar, which is a handy design for setting up a camera in tricky situations--but it's significantly larger (and therefore more sturdy), still compact and lightweight, and FAR better made. The parts are of excellent quality, and I'm very excited to start putting it to use.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great quality material.
reviews.reviewText: Extremely professional material and stability. 100% recommended

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 18, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I bought this for my gopro and its been extremely functional as a mount. Ive hung it from blinds and curtain rods, tree branches, lumber racks on truck and a slew of other things. It does its job well

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This was bought to do school project videos. Thick legs allows the use of my phone or even a camera. This is as came in handy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I LOVE this stand. I’ve been putting it everywhere to get best angles for content! Would purchase over and over again!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent for Travel TikToks
reviews.reviewText: This works really well for gripping into railings, poles, tripods and all sorts of weird surfaces. I am really happy with the durability. I keep thinking it will snap but hasn’t happened yet! Haha

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Conveniently sized, lightweight, durable and affordable!
reviews.reviewText: Perfect portable tripod for all scenarios. I use this most with my iPhone 14 Pro Max and Galaxy S22 Ultra, both fit with no problem. Small enough to toss in a bag. Strong flexible legs allow for clamping to various objects for that perfect camera angle. Recommended.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 14, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars GREAT PHONE STAND!
reviews.reviewText: I really like this phone stand with its versatility and not having to hold phone when receiving or making calls. I gave this only 3 stars because it does not come with a remote.
Es un tirpie más robusto de.lo que creí, fácilmente soporta una DSLR.
looks and acts exactly as shown. nice strong metal parts, can crank down on the bolts for strong grip and solid stability. the GoPro mount is perfect. it is a very good product for it's price.
Très solide, et possibilité de changer le sabot facilement. Rien à redire
Eher nur für kleinere Kameras und Smartphone, die angegebenen 2kg kommen nicht auch sollte die Kamera kein großes Teleobjektiv haben.
